verses.text: ELOHIMI, ke ke fakamo‘ui au ‘o taau mo ho huafa, Pea fakamaau ‘eku me‘a ‘o taau mo ho to‘a.
‘Elohimi, fanongo ki he‘eku lotu; Ofe‘i ho fofonga ki he lea ‘a hoku ngutu.
He kuo tu‘u kiate au ha fanga muli, Pea ko e kau fakamālohi kuo tuli ki he‘eku mo‘ui; Kuo ‘ikai te nau tuku ‘i honau ‘ao ‘a ‘Elohimi. (Sila)
Vakai, ko ‘Elohimi hoku tokoni; Ko ‘Ātonai ko e pāletu‘a ‘o ‘eku mo‘ui.
Te ne fakafoki ki hoku ngaahi fili ‘enau kovi: ‘Ē, faka‘auha kinautolu ‘o taau mo ho‘o mo‘oni.
Te u fai fiefai ha feilaulau ki he ‘Afiona: Te u fakafeta‘i ki ho huafa, ‘e Sihova; he ‘oku lelei ia.
He kuo ne hamusi au mei he kotoa ‘o ‘eku mamahi; Pea ko e sioa ‘e hoku mata ‘a hoku ngaahi fili.
